thread.title: Newsnight presenter Kirsty Wark suffered 'hard menopause'
thread.title_full: Newsnight presenter Kirsty Wark suffered 'hard menopause'

title: Newsnight presenter Kirsty Wark suffered 'hard menopause'
text: show ad Newsnight presenter Kirsty Wark suffered 'hard menopause' after ditching HRT over cancer fears Kirsty Wark said she endured sleepless nights and severe sweats, which left her 'literally wrung out' when she stopped taking the hormone therapy Miss Wark began taking HRT after having a hysterectomy at the age of 47, which included the removal of her ovaries But after reading a 2002 study which found links between HRT and increased risks of breast cancer, the presenter stopped taking the pills
